ygData.subject: Re: CF Security Alert
ygData.msgSnippet: Whistler, before complaining that you ve been ignored, first take the time to see that KLUSTER HAS BEEN CALLING ALL THE MAXIMALS TO A MEETING FOR THE LAST

Subject: Re: CF Security Alert

From: Yanshosh@...

Whistler, before complaining that you've been ignored, first take the 
time to see that KLUSTER HAS BEEN CALLING ALL THE MAXIMALS TO A 
MEETING FOR THE LAST SEVERAL DAYS!!!

I'm serious, this meeting is important. This goes to everyone. If you 
have Maxi chars, GET TO THE SLAGGING MEETING.

::Kluster::

Kluster frowns, recieving Chordate's transmission. "I see. Allright, 
put them on enemy. But if they approach, alert me. THe Maximals are 
having a meeting right now, but I'd appreciate it if you stayed and 
watched the scanners."

He growls, pushing a button near his seat. A transmission is sent out 
to all Maximals, repeated over and over and over untill they would be 
detected to be within the Cybertronian Fire. The message also played 
over the intercom of the CF.

"All Maximals, this is the fourth call. Get to the Cybertronian 
Fire's conference room immediately. This meeting is not optional."

Kluster ends the transmission, sitting back in his chair. What kind 
of a team was this? No wonder they needed help in the war. He looks 
at the hologram of Koj, frowning.

"Why did you and Inu just steal supplies from the Cybertronian Fire?"








--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> (I'm taking back control of Chordate from Yanshosh)
> 
> 
> Chordate:
> 
> 
> 
> Chordate sipped a cup of slightly heated energon.  It was about 
five degrees 
> lower than the temperature needed to set the energon off into an 
explosion.  
> He spit his energon up on his lap, though he ignored that, and 
looked at a 
> monitor.
> 
> He saw Koj and Inu shoot open storage chamber and continued to 
watch them 
> leave the Cybertronian Fire.  He activated his comm. unit to 
Kluster and Iron 
> Raptor.
> 
> "Kluster, Iron Raptor, this is Chordate.  Those two new Maximals, 
Koj and 
> Inu, have just stolen quite a bit of supplies from the Cybertronian 
Fire, and 
> in the direction they're heading, I can only see one real important 
thing, 
> the Ark.  I'm going to place them on enemy." he ended the 
transmission.
> 
> He finished putting them on enemy only a cycle later, when a 
thought popped 
> into his head.  Ever since that Predacon inflitrated the 
Cybertronian Fire, 
> the codes had never been changed.  The comm. frequencies and shield 
> frequencies had, but nothing else.
> 
> He began working on that, knowing it would only take a couple 
cycles to set 
> up the programs to randomly change the codes that would then send 
all the new 
> codes to those with the authority.
> 
> (Such as, people, I can't tell who gets which codes because I don't 
know all 
> the Maximals, but for something like emergency shut off of all 
systems in the 
> CF, new recruits wouldn't have that.  That would be just Iron 
Raptor, 
> Kluster, and Chordate.  Please be logical like that when Chordate 
finishes 
> the codes and I have him send 'em out.  Thank you)
